inheritedEffect: [Opponent's Turn] While this digimon has the [Four Sovereigns] or [God Beast] trait, it gains ＜Blocker＞.

name: Baihumon ACE
effect:
[Digivolve] Lv.5 w/[Deva] trait: Cost 3
[Hand][Counter] ＜Blast Digivolve＞ (One of your Digimon may digivolve into this card without paying the cost.)

[On Deletion] Delete 1 of your opponent's highest play cost Digimon.
inheritedEffect: ＜Overflow (-4)＞ (As this card moves from the battle area or under a card to another area, lose 4 memory.)

name: MetalEtemon
effect:
[Digivolve] Lv.5 w/[Etemon]/[Sukamon] in name: Cost 3
[On Play][When Digivolving] Delete 1 of your opponent's play cost 3 or lower Digimon or Tamers. For each card with [Etemon] or [Sukamon] in its name in your trash, add 1 to the maximum play cost this effect can choose.
[Opponent's Turn][Once Per Turn] When an opponent's Digimon attacks, by placing 1 card with [Etemon] or [Sukamon] in its name from your hand on top of your security stack, you may switch the target of attack to this Digimon or the player.

name: MetalEtemon
effect:
[Digivolve] Lv.5 w/[Etemon]/[Sukamon] in name: Cost 3

name: HeavyLeomon
effect:
[Digivolve] Lv.5 w/[Leomon] in name: Cost 4
＜Fortitude＞ (When this Digimon with digivolution cards is deleted, play this card without paying the cost)
[When Digivolving][On Deletion] ＜De-Digivolve 1＞ 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, return 1 of their 6000 DP or lower Digimon to the bottom of the deck.
[End of Attack][Once Per Turn] Return 1 of your opponent's 4000 DP or lower Digimon to the bottom of the deck. If you didn't, unsuspend this Digimon.

name: Syakomon
effect: [On Play] For each of your opponent's Digimon, ＜Draw 1＞. Then, trash 1 card in your hand.
inheritedEffect: [All Turns][Once Per Turn] When an effect plays an opponent's Digimon, gain 1 memory.

name: Labramon
effect: [On Play] By trashing 1 card in your hand, you may return 1 Digimon card with the [Dark Animal] or [Shaman] trait from your trash to the hand.
inheritedEffect: [Your Turn][Once Per Turn] When an effect plays one of your Digimon, gain 1 memory.

name: Octomon
effect: [On Play][When Digivolving] If there are 4 or more total Digimon, play 1 [Fujitsumon] Token suspended to your battle area. (Digimon/Purple/3000 DP/"[All Turns] This Digimon can't unsuspend. [On Deletion] Trash 1 card in your hand.") If there are 3 or fewer, play it suspended to your opponent's battle area.
inheritedEffect: [All Turns][Once Per Turn] When an effect plays an opponent's Digimon, gain 1 memory.

name: Dobermon (X Antibody)
effect:
[Digivolve] [Dobermon]: Cost 0
[On Play] 1 of your Digimon gains ＜Retaliation＞ until the end of your opponent's turn.
[When Digivolving] ＜Draw 1＞. Then, trash 1 card in your hand. If [Dobermon] or [X Antibody] is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, activate this Digimon's [On Play] effects.
inheritedEffect: [Your Turn][Once Per Turn] When an effect plays one of your Digimon, gain 1 memory.

name: Dragomon
effect:
[On Play][When Digivolving] Your opponent plays 1 level 4 or lower Digimon card from their trash suspended without paying the cost. [On Play] effects on Digimon played by this effect don't activate.
[All Turns][Once Per Turn] When an effect plays an opponent's Digimon, you may play 1 purple Digimon card with a level less than or equal to it from your trash without paying the cost.
inheritedEffect: ＜Piercing＞ (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon, it performs any security checks it normally would.)

name: Cerberusmon (X Antibody)
effect:
[Digivolve] Lv.5 w/[Cerberusmon] in name w/o [X Antibody] trait: Cost 0
[On Play] You may play 1 purple level 3 Digimon card from your trash without paying the cost.
[When Digivolving] ＜Draw 1＞. Then, trash 1 card in your hand. If a Digimon card with [Cerberusmon] in its name or [X Antibody] is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, activate this Digimon's [On Play] effects.
inheritedEffect: [When Attacking][Once Per Turn] By deleting 1 of your other Digimon, unsuspend this Digimon.

name: Anubismon
effect:
[When Digivolving][Main][Once Per Turn] You may trash up to 3 cards in your hand. Then, play 1 purple Digimon card from your trash with the play cost reduced by 3. For each card trashed by this effect, further reduce it by 1.
[Your Turn] When an effect plays one of your Digimon, delete 1 of your opponent's level 5 or lower Digimon. If this effect didn't delete, ＜Draw 1＞.

name: Anubismon
effect:
[When Digivolving][Main][Once Per Turn] You may trash up to 3 cards in your hand. Then, play 1 purple Digimon card from your trash with the play cost reduced by 3. For each card trashed by this effect, further reduce it by 1.
[Your Turn] When an effect plays one of your Digimon, delete 1 of your opponent's level 5 or lower Digimon. If this effect didn't delete, ＜Draw 1＞.

name: Leviamon
effect:
＜Security A. +1＞
[On Play][When Digivolving] If your opponent has as many or more total Digimon and Tamers as you, delete 1 of your opponent's highest level Digimon. Then, delete 1 of your opponent’s lowest level Digimon.
[All Turns] When an opponent's Digimon is deleted, gain 1 memory for each Digimon deleted.

name: Leviamon
effect:
＜Security A. +1＞

[All Turns] When an opponent's Digimon is deleted, gain 1 memory for each Digimon deleted.

name: Koh & Sayo
effect:
[Start of Your Turn] If you have 2 or fewer memory, set it to 3.
[On Play] [Main] By suspending this Tamer and placing the top card of one of your [Light Fang] or [Night claw] trait Digimon as that Digimon's bottom digivolution card, 1 of your Digimon may digivolve into a Digimon card in your hand without paying the cost.
securityEffect: [Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

name: Sayo & Koh
effect:
[Your Turn] When an effect places the top card of one of your Digimon in a Digimon's digivolution cards, by suspending this Tamer, gain 1 memory.
[Start of Opponent's Turn] By playing 1 card with the same level as one of your [Night Claw] or [Light Fang] trait Digimon from that Digimon's digivolution cards without paying the cost, 2 of your Digimon may DNA digivolve into a Digimon card in your hand. At the end of the turn, return the Digimon played by this effect to the hand.
securityEffect: [Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

name: Phoebus Blow
effect: [Main] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with the lowest DP. Then, if you have a Tamer, return 1 Digimon card with the [Light Fang], [Night Claw] or [Galaxy] trait from your trash to the hand.

name: Good Night Moon
effect: [Main] Until the end of your opponent's turn, 1 of your opponent's Digimon and 1 of their Tamers can't suspend. Then, you may play 1 Tamer card with the [Night Claw] or [Light Fang] trait from your hand without paying the cost.

name: Flashy Boss Punch
effect:
While you have a Digimon with [Leomon] or [Bancho] in its name, you may ignore this card's color requirements.
[Main] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon, and 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -12000 DP for the turn. Then, 1 of your Digimon with [Leomon] or [Bancho] in its name may attack.
securityEffect: [Security] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon, and 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -12000 DP for the turn.

name: Biting Crush
effect:
[Main] By trashing 1 card in your hand, delete 1 of your opponent's level 6 or lower Digimon. If this effect trashed a card with the [Seven Great Demon Lords] trait, place this card in the battle area.
[All Turns] When an effect plays an opponent's Digimon, ＜Delay＞.
・ You may play 1 [Leviamon] from your trash without paying the cost.

name: X Antibody Proto Form
effect:
While you have a Digimon, you may ignore this card's color requirements.
[Security] Add this card to the hand.
[Main] 1 of your Digimon without [X Antibody] in its digivolution cards may digivolve into a Digimon card with the [X Antibody] trait in your hand with the digivolution cost reduced by 1. If it did, place this card as its bottom digivolution card.
(Rule) Name: Also treated as [X Antibody].
inheritedEffect: [All Turns] When this Digimon would leave the battle area other than by one of your effects, from this Digimon's digivolution cards, return 1 Digimon card to the hand and place 1 [X Antibody] on top of your security stack.

name: Loyalty Deeper than the Sea
effect:
While you have a Digimon with the [Deva] or [Four Sovereigns] trait, you may ignore this card's color requirements.
[Main] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Place 1 card with the [Deva] or [Four Sovereigns] trait among them as the bottom digivolution card of 1 of your Digimon or add it to the hand. Return the rest to the top or bottom of the deck.

name: Holy Beasts Great Cardinal Positions
effect:
While you have a Digimon with the [Deva] or [Four Sovereigns] trait, you may ignore this card's color requirements.
When this card would be used, reduce the cost by 1 for each [Deva] or [Four Sovereigns] trait card with a different name in your trash.
[Main] You may play 1 Digimon card with [Fanglongmon] in its name from your hand without paying the cost.
securityEffect: [Security] Return 1 card with [Fanglongmon] in its name from your trash to the hand. Then, add this card to the hand.

name: GraceNovamon
effect:
[DNA Digivolve] [Apollomon]+[Dianamon]: Cost 0
＜Security A. +1＞＜Blocker＞

[All Turns] When this Digimon would leave the battle area by an opponent's effect, by trashing 2 same-level cards in this Digimon's digivolution cards, prevent it from leaving.

name: Fanglongmon
effect:
[Digivolve] Lv.6 w/[Four Sovereigns] trait: Cost 4
[On Play][When Attacking] By returning up to 4 cards with the [Deva] or [Four Sovereigns] trait from your trash to the bottom of the deck, for each one, all your opponent's Digimon get -4000 DP for the turn.
[When Attacking] For each of your Digimon with the [Four Sovereigns] trait, trash the top card of your opponent's security stack.
[All Turns] This Digimon isn't affected by the effects of your opponent's Digimon.
